meanings.definition: The quality or style of resembling a painting in composition or technique.
meanings.sent1: The painterlinesses of the landscape captured in the artwork were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: Her painting exhibited a beautiful painterlinesses that drew the viewer in.
meanings.sent3: The artist exaggerated the painterlinesses of the scene, making it look like a dream.
meanings.sent4: The painterlinesses of the portrait added depth and emotion to the subject.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant painterlinesses of the sunset made it seem almost alive.

meanings.definition: The use of painterly techniques in a work of art.
meanings.sent1: The painterlinesses in the brush strokes gave the painting a sense of movement.
meanings.sent2: The artist's skillful painterlinesses transformed the ordinary scene into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The playful painterlinesses in the artwork made it stand out among the rest.
meanings.sent4: The subtle painterlinesses in the background added a touch of mystery to the painting.
meanings.sent5: The delicate painterlinesses of the flowers made them appear almost real.
